```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
```

``` {r}
data <- read_csv("Data/morningstarPull.csv")


```


Creates 'months_to_50m' and 'months_to_75m' columns 
``` {r}


data <- data %>%
  rowwise() %>%
  mutate(months_to_50m = {
    vals <- c_across(`Total Net Assets 2014-07`:`Total Net Assets 2025-06`)
    vals <- vals[!is.na(vals) & vals > 0]
    match(TRUE, cumsum(vals) >= 50000000)
  },
   months_to_75m = {
      vals <- c_across(`Total Net Assets 2014-07`:`Total Net Assets 2025-06`)
      vals <- vals[!is.na(vals) & vals > 0]
      match(TRUE, cumsum(vals) >= 75000000)
   }
  ) %>%
  ungroup()
```

``` {r}

dashboard <- data %>%
  select(`Branding Name`, Fund, `Active/Passive`, `Morningstar Category`, months_to_50m, months_to_75m)

companies <-  dashboard %>%
  group_by(`Branding Name`) %>%
  summarise(
    avg_months_to_50m = mean(months_to_50m, na.rm = TRUE),
    avg_months_to_75m = mean(months_to_75m, na.rm = TRUE)
  )
```
